18 person	squliq, s7kh~ulikh~ //
19 fish	quleh, siukh~ // kulikh~ is another word
21 dog	huzil //
22 louse	kuhiN //
23 tree	 //
25 leaf	abau //
28 skin	kiahil //
30 blood	ramu7, ramo //
31 bone	qni7 //
34 horn	 //
39 ear	papak //
40 eye	loziq, raoi // roi and rEoyak are other words for eye
41 nose	moru, iduN // NEho, norh~o, Nuhu are other words
43 tooth	gunukh~, nux // genohu is another word
44 tongue	hmali7, hamaui //
47 knee	 //
48 hand	qba7, kava // keiman, ava, rapa7 are other words
51 breast	bubu7, vovo //
53 liver	szik //
54 drink	mnbu //
57 see	mita7 //
58 hear	muN //
61 die	mh~oqil //
66 come	muah //

74 star	biNah, henga // veinga and mintoyan are other words
75 water	qsia7, usiak //
77 stone	btunux, vatunukh~ //

85 path	tuqi //
86 mountain	 //
92 night	biNi7, hNan // r7vian is another word
